post.author: 임기순
post.content:
TEKsystems’ client in the GTA is looking for a Senior Java Team Lead to lead a team of up to 10 people. This is for a full time - permanent opportunity. The successful candidate will have extensive experience working with energetic/dynamic teams and a proven track record of success.
The position requires strong knowledge of Java/J2EE and Oracle as well as an ability to solve complex problems. The project will involve interaction with the business unit and clients on a daily basis with minimal to no supervision. While prior experience within the financial industry is not required, it will be considered an asset.
The successful candidate will have technical experience with J2EE, Java and Oracle as well as have 3-5 years experience as a team lead.
TEKsystems would like to thank all those who apply. However, only short listed candidates will be contacted. Also, two managerial references will be required for all applicants who wish to work with TEKsystems. Please be prepared to provide them.
Required Skills:
§ JAVA
§ AGILE
§ ORACLE
Kind Regards,
Stephanie Coutts TECHNICAL RECRUITER 350 Burnhamthorpe Road West, Suite 700, Mississauga, Ontario, L5B 3J1 800.254.0778 905.283.1330
WWW.TEKSYSTEMS.CA
post.title: PERM - Senior Java Team Lead
